quotes.quote: When I'm away from you, I'm still with you, when my eyes are closed, I still see you, when I'm awake, I still dream of you, when I feel have everything, I still need you, and no matter what I still love you.
My heart had been touched by him, battered by him, cradled by him as the days passed. He was cruel without meaning to be yet he was kind, and I needed him too much to let myself want him
I've already been to hell and back. This time, I want to go to paradise. I want to do whatever it is you want. Because all I want is you, by my side, from this moment until forever
I want you to need me like the air you breathe, i want you to hold me in your loving arms, i want you to need me, like I need you!
Today and always, beyond tomorrow, I need you beside me, always as my friend, lover and forever soul mate
I want her to melt into me, like butter on toast. I want to absorb her and walk around for the rest of my days with her encased in my skin. I want.
You came like the night thief, bloomed in my heart like the red rose and I want you to light up my life like the morning sun
I don't care if I'm not your first. All I want is to be your last!
I want you and I hate wanting things and I especially hate admitting I want them.
The wait is long, my dream of you does not end.
If I knew I would be so happy one day, I would have searched for you harder and found you before so that I could spend more time with you.
I want him everywhere. I burn for him in places he hasn't even touched.
Everyday I tell myself I need to get over you, But every night I find myself thinking about how much I want you back.
Every single day I want you to be happy and full of joy, just like you make me happy by just passing through my mind.
Your cute smile and your happy laughter attracted me to you, but your caring loving heart is the reason why I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
I want him to be happy. And I want you to be happy, too. Even if you can only find that happiness without me.
I want you to like me, but I don't care if you don't.
I can't tell if wanting you is selfish or stupid.
I want you to know that you are the best thing that has ever happened to my life and I will never ever allow anyone to take you from me.
I want you to be happy...to laugh, smile and rejoice in order that others may be made happy by you.
I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.
I don't want you to save me I want you to stand by my side as I save myself
I want you to know, that you deserve the best. You're beautiful.
I wished upon a star, hoping it come true. The next day we met and I ended up with you.

So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday.
I want to be with you forever and beyond.
I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
Love to me is someone telling me, 'I want to be with you for the rest of my life, and if you needed me to I'd jump out of a plane for you.
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
I love her and that's the beginning and end of everything.
If I know what love is, it is because of you.
Things must be felt with the heart.
The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
To lose balance sometimes for love is part of living a balanced life.
Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever.
Take my hand, take my whole life too. For I can’t help falling in love with you.
You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known and even that is an understatement.
When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
If you remember me, then I don’t care if everyone else forgets.
He’s more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
You are, and always have been, my dream.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
You make me want to be a better man.
